message:
SYSTEM: NicolasMayo2018.pdf: Página 33
Rule-based reasoning
Capturing speciﬁc use cases
▶Rules represent application-dedicated deductions mechanisms
▶Rules can provide ”behavioural interoperability”
From SWRL to SHACL
▶SWRL allows the representation of rules that can be stored in
an ontology
▶SWRL evolved into SPIN, neither being W3C standards
▶SHACL was adopted in 2017, to represent shapes and rules
speaker: SYSTEM
